VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Distribution relative to AgriFlow Solutions?
SRP.A: Verdant Distribution is {below} AgriFlow Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {HarvestLink Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food waste?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AgriFlow Solutions}.

VE.Q: What is CropConnect Logistics's Food Waste in 1953?
VE.A: CropConnect Logistics's food waste in 1953 is {8980.98} tons.

VE.Q: What is HarvestLink Systems's Food Waste in 1957?
VE.A: HarvestLink Systems's food waste in 1957 is {16199.77} tons.

VE.Q: What is CropConnect Logistics's Food Waste in 1957?
VE.A: CropConnect Logistics's food waste in 1957 is {6004.29} tons.

VE.Q: What are the food waste of HarvestLink Systems, AgriFlow Solutions, and CropConnect Logistics in 1952?
VE.A: HarvestLink Systems's food waste is {10189} tons, AgriFlow Solutions's food waste is {10062.97} tons, CropConnect Logistics's food waste is {10042.67} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Food Waste in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum food waste is {3553.23} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Food Waste in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum food waste is {25836.17} tons.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Food Waste level recorded for AgriFlow Solutions?
EVJ.A: AgriFlow Solutions reached approximately {10062.97} tons in {1952}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Food Waste level recorded for AgriFlow Solutions?
EVJ.A: AgriFlow Solutions's lowest recorded level is approximately {3553.23} tons in {1962}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Food Waste?
SC.A: The average total food waste is {39418.95} tons.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Waste fall between 37550.71 and 41503.41 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Food Waste go below 38516.29 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Food Waste exceed 40537.83 tons? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1955 higher or lower than in 1958?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1955 was {lower} than in 1958.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Waste in 1957 higher or lower than in 1962?
NC.A: The total food waste in 1957 was {lower} than in 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1957, was the average total Food Waste higher or lower than between 1959 and 1961?
NC.A: The average total food waste between 1956 and 1957 was {lower} than between 1959 and 1961.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1962, was the average total Food Waste higher or lower than between 1952 and 1956?
NC.A: The average total food waste between 1952 and 1962 was {higher} than between 1952 and 1956.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {HarvestLink Systems} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {AgriFlow Solutions, CropConnect Logistics, Verdant Distribution, HarvestLink Systems}.
